answers.answer: Hi,How are you? Constant urge to pass urine can happen due to infections, STD’s, diabetes, increased  intake of water, prostrate enlargement etc.What is your age? Are you a male or a female? Do you have any other accompanying symptoms like burning sensation, discharge, foul smelling urine ?If yes it would be ideal to get a urine analysis with culture done and visit a urologist.Feel free to post to me for further queries or suggestions.All the best.

question: why am i peeing so often??...and when im done. i feel i have to pee more but i cant.
title: whats wrong with me
